TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RelationshipManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 用于跟踪对象上下文中对象之间的关系。

span.span: Used to track relationships between objects in the object context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于跟踪对象上下文中对象之间的关系。 is used to track relationships between objects in an object context. 对于对象上下文中跟踪的每个关系，都有一个 类的实例。There is one instance of the class for each relationship tracked in the object context. 关系由概念模型中的关联定义。Relationships are defined by associations in a conceptual model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41). ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于 " [Microsoft SQL Server 产品示例：数据库](https://archive.codeplex.com/?p=msftdbprodsamples)"。The example in this topic is based on the [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://archive.codeplex.com/?p=msftdbprodsamples). 该示例向实体中添加新 `SalesOrderHeader` 实体 `Contact` 。The example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity. 然后，它从实体获取所有相关端， `Contact` 并显示每个相关端的关系名称、源角色名称和目标角色名称。Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays the relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#irelatedend)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#irelatedend)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由实现 的对象使用。The method is used by objects that implement . 当对象服务请求实现了 的对象的 属性时，如果对象的关系管理器不存在，将调用 方法。When Object Services requests the property of an object that implements , the method is called if the relationship manager does not already exist for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回和对象的枚举 。The method returns an enumeration of and objects. 和 是派生自的具体类型 。 and are concrete types that derive from . 抽象类实现 接口。The abstract class implements the interface. ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于 " [Microsoft SQL Server 产品示例：数据库](https://archive.codeplex.com/?p=msftdbprodsamples)"。The example in this topic is based on the [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://archive.codeplex.com/?p=msftdbprodsamples). 该示例向实体中添加新 `SalesOrderHeader` 实体 `Contact` 。The example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity. 然后，它从实体获取所有相关端， `Contact` 并显示每个相关端的关系名称、源角色名称和目标角色名称，Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end, [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#irelatedend)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#irelatedend)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取具有指定关系名称和目标角色名称的相关对象的 。Gets an of related objects that have the specified relationship name and target role name. 关系名称不应由命名空间限定。The relationship name should not be namespace qualified. 如果将命名空间置于关系名称之前，将发生错误。An error occurs when you prepend the namespace to the relationship name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法旨在用于用户没有全部元数据的情况，包括关系两端的静态类型信息。This method is intended to be used in scenarios where the user does not have full metadata, including the static type information for both ends of the relationship. 这些元数据在关系中的每个实体类型上的 对象中指定，这样元数据系统可以根据提供的关系名称和目标角色名称进行检索。This metadata is specified in the object on each entity type in the relationship, so the metadata system can retrieve it based on the supplied relationship name and target role name. 关系名称不应由命名空间限定。The relationship name should not be namespace qualified. 如果将命名空间置于关系名称之前，将发生错误。An error occurs when you prepend the namespace to the relationship name.

span.span: or is .

exception.span: 源类型不匹配所有者类型。

span.span: The source type does not match the type of the owner.
is invalid.
-or-

exception.span: 无法在元数据中找到关系类型。

span.span: Unable to find the relationship type in the metadata.

summary.span: 由对象服务调用，用来准备 以序列化关系进行二进制序列化。

span.span: Called by Object Services to prepare an for binary serialization with a serialized relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关系的序列化仅支持用于二进制序列化。Serialization of relationships is only supported for binary serialization. 完整的对象图（包括关系）不支持用于 Windows Communication Foundation 和 XML 序列化。Complete object graphs, including relationships, is not supported for Windows Communication Foundation and XML serialization. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [序列化对象](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb738446(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Serializing Objects](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb738446(v=vs.100)).
